description:
Professor Ichigaya`s Chesnaught lives and works at the Ichigaya Laboratory in the Kalos region near Eisetsu Gym where there was desolate land. He is continuing the work of the professor as he died sometime ago from an incurable illness but left instructions for those that visited his laboratory to understand his work and for Brigarron to continue working with Robon.
Often comes to check up on it and Brigarron initially thought Ash and his friends where there to interfere with the work. It protects Robon even though Professor Ichigaya is no longer around. When Rocket Gang severely damaged Robon, Professor Ichigaya`s Chesnaught got extremely angry and broke through the reinforced rings to send them flying off.
name: Brigarron (Ichigaya-hakase)
